abled

======================================================
Fri Dec 17 15:58:26 2021
Executing on host: DESKTOP-NV769LF Current SFLM Server: DESKTOP-NV769LF:3162/
ATLAS>
#Defining meshes for the device: Meshes should be as fine as possible,
# defining another mesh for non-local BTBT modelling in ATLAS
#Defining electrodes: channel length in this example is 100 nm
# The top gate A, it is named gate

Electrode #1 Name: gate Number of boundary nodes: 135 Dimensions in microns: min max x 1.000e-001 1.600e-001 y -3.000e-003 -3.000e-003
ATLAS>
#The bottom gate B, it is named substrate

Electrode #2 Name: substrate Number of boundary nodes: 135 Dimensions in microns: min max x 1.000e-001 1.600e-001 y 1.300e-002 1.300e-002
ATLAS>

Electrode #3 Name: drain Number of boundary nodes: 4 Dimensions in microns: min max x 0.000e+000 2.719e-002 y -2.978e-019 0.000e+000
Warning: Electrode shortened in X-direction.
ATLAS>

Electrode #4 Name: source Number of boundary nodes: 6 Dimensions in microns: min max x 3.545e-001 4.000e-001 y -2.978e-019 0.000e+000
Warning: Electrode shortened in X-direction.
ATLAS>
#Defining doping: The doping profile is assumed to be abrupt
doping uniform n.type conc=1e17 x.min=0.100 x.max=0.200 reg=2
Mesh Type: non-cylindrical Total grid points: 16095 Total triangles : 31248 Obtuse triangles : 0 (0 %)
doping uniform n.type conc=1e18 x.max=0.100 reg=2
doping uniform p.type conc=1e20 x.min=0.200 reg=2
Warning: Both REGION and MATERIAL parameters specified on MATERIAL statement. Ignoring REGION specification. ATLAS>
#The structure file for the device in equilibrium

MASTER format file written to test_eqb_and.str at Fri Dec 17 15:58:34 2021
ATLAS>
#Defining physical models: Band gap narrowing effect is included.
#The effect of concentration dependent mobility and SRH models are also
#included, though their impact in this example is found to be not appreciable.
models bbt.nonlocal qtunn.dir=1 qtunn.el qtunn.ho bgn consrh conmob print
Points describing QT region 1 Upper 0.04000 0.01000 um Upper 0.36000 0.01000 um Lower 0.04000 0.00000 um Lower 0.36000 0.00000 um Total of 15 slices with 407 points each

CONSTANTS: Boltzmann's constant = 1.38066e-023 J/K Elementary charge = 1.60219e-019 C Permitivity in vacuum = 8.85419e-014 F/cm Temperature = 300 K Thermal voltage = 0.025852 V
REGIONAL MATERIAL PARAMETERS: Region : 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 Material : SiO2 Silicon SiO2 Conductor Conductor Conductor Conductor Type : insulator semicond. insulator metal metal metal metal

Average Composition Fraction X-composition: 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 Y-composition: 0 0 0 0 0 0 0
Band Parameters Epsilon : 16 11.8 16 Eg (eV) : 1.08 Chi (eV) : 4.17 Nc (per cc)

: 2.8e+019 Nv (per cc) : 1.04e+019 ni (per cc) : 1.45e+010
Bandgap narrowing parameters bgn.e (eV) : 0.009 bgn.n (/cc) : 1e+017 bgn.c : 0.5
ubgn.b : 3.1e+012 ubgn.c : 3.9e-005 bgn.shnk.me : 0.321 bgn.shnk.mh : 0.346 bgn.shnk.eps : 11.7 bgn.shnk.ge : 1
2 bgn.shnk.gh : 4 bgn.lind.anc : 0.00974 bgn.lind.bnc : 0.00139 bgn.lind.anv : 0.0127 bgn.lind.bnv : 0.0014 bgn.lind.apc :

bgn.lind.na : 1e+018
Effective Richardson Constants An* : 110 Ap* : 30
Incomplete Ionization Parameters
Recombination Parameters taun0 : 1e-007 taup0 : 1e-007

ksrhtp : 0.0025 ksrhcn : 3e-013 ksrhcp : 1.18e-012 ksrhgn : 1.77 ksrhgp : 0.57 nsrhn :
5e+016 nsrhp : 5e+016 augn : 2.8e-031 augp : 9.9e-032 augkn : 0 augkp : 0 kaugcn

hns.he : 3.47 hns.hh : 8.26 hns.n0e : 1e+018 hns.p0e : 1e+018 copt : 0

.tunnel : 0.25 me.tunnel : 0.14 mh.tunnel : 0.14

.03e+007 vsatp (cm/s) : 1.03e+007
REGIONAL MODEL FLAGS: Region: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 SRH T consrh T klasrh F Auger F klaaug F picaug
F hnsaug F auggen F kerraug F richteraug F optr F optr.gb F bgn(std/kla) T ubgn F bgn.alamo F
bgn.bennett F bgn.schenk F bgn.lind F bgn.persson F incomplete F inc.two_level F inc.ion F ioniz F inc.cryo F bbt F
bbtauto F bbthurkx F bbtkane F bbtschenk F bbtheigl F bbtnonlocal T tat(local) F tatnonlocal F tat(coulombic) F impact

F Boltzmann T Fermi-Dirac F
